dc_title_s: Railroad map of Michigan prepared for the Commissioner of Railroads by O.W. Gray & Son.
dc_creator_sm: O.W. Gray & Son.,Michigan. Department of Commissioner of Railroads.,G.W. & C.B. Colton & Co.
dc_description_s: Entered according to act of Congress in the year 1874 by G.W. & C.B. Colton & Co. ... Appears in Michigan Railroad Commission. Fourth annual report. 1876, and in McCracken, S. B. The state of Michigan. Lansing, 1876. Includes inset of "part of Michigan" (western Upper Peninsula). 1 map: hand col.; 58 x 40 cm This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
